channel.title: Projects on Alison Hill
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alison Hill

item.title: Hugo Apéro
item.description: A Hugo theme for personal websites. A place where you and your site’s visitors enjoy spending time, and one that helps folks get to know you better.

item.title: distill
item.description: Distill for R Markdown is a web publishing format optimized for scientific and technical communication.

item.title: RStudio Teaching in Production
item.description: A 2-hour workshop for RStudio certified trainers on how to make shareable slides and websites with R Markdown.

item.title: palmerpenguins
item.description: An R data package with data about 3 penguin species from the Palmer Station in Antarctica

item.title: stat545.com
item.description: A comprehensive course in data wrangling, exploration, and analysis with R

item.title: tidymodels.org
item.description: The central location for learning and using the tidymodels R packages

item.title: Introduction to Machine Learning with the Tidyverse
item.description: Introducing the basics of machine learning in R using tidymodels

item.title: education.rstudio.com
item.description: All about learning and teaching data science

item.title: R Markdown for Medicine
item.description: A four-hour workshop that will take you on a tour of how to get from data to manuscript using R Markdown.

item.title: Hugo Graphite
item.description: A Hugo theme for RStudio teams (Education, Tidyverse, Tidymodels)

item.title: Labhub
item.description: An OHSU Open Science Workshop on tools and methods for building transparency within a lab

item.title: Up & Running with blogdown
item.description: A workshop to get up and running with blogdown, GitHub, and Netlify

item.title: Code Your Graph Workshop
item.description: A workshop on visualizing your data with ggplot2 and matplotlib

item.title: Advanced R Markdown
item.description: A two-day workshop for those who want to take their R Markdown skills to the next level

item.title: Bakeoff
item.description: An R data package with data from “The Great British Bake Off”

item.title: blogdown: Creating Websites with R Markdown
item.description: A practical guide for creating websites using the blogdown package in R

item.title: Introduction to Data Wrangling, Analysis, & Communication
item.description: A 12-week introductory course that teaches students how to gain and communicate insights from biomedical data

item.title: Principles & Practice of Data Visualization
item.description: A 12-week introduction to data visualization with hands-on labs using R and ggplot2

item.title: Probability & Statistics for Scientists and Engineers
item.description: A 12-week introduction to fundamental concepts underlying statistical data display, analysis, inference, and statistical decision making

item.title: RLadies xaringan theme
item.description: An RLadies theme for slides made with the xaringan R package

item.title: Summer of blogdown
item.description: A week of the blogdown R package for RStudio’s summer 2019 interns
